abstract: Things are heating up between H.P. and Cisco Systems as both companies encroach on each others’ turf.
snippet: Things are heating up between H.P. and Cisco Systems as both companies encroach on each others’ turf.
lead_paragraph: It’s pretty amusing to watch Hewlett-Packard and Cisco Systems come to grips with what amounts to a Data Center Death Match.

headline.main: Hewlett-Packard’s War of Words With Cisco Begins
